description:
The food fight festival is here, and the Rentarou Family moves out in order to win the special gelato for themselves. Will they be successful?
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Evőverseny Fesztivál - ahol a harc kezdődik, és véget is ér!
Kaimaku! Gekitou! Kecchaku! Food Fight Festival
The Beginning and the End! Food Fight Festival!
開幕! 激闘! 決着! フードファイトフェスティバル
